suite.doc: üóÑÔ∏è Storage & System Validation Test Suite - Test-5 üîç Process: Find hostname in EDS ‚Üí SSH to server ‚Üí Collect disk/CPU/memory data ‚Üí Compare server vs EDS ‚úÖ Pass if server resources match EDS requirements, ‚ùå Fail if mismatch üìä Validates: CPU cores, RAM, disk space allocation, filesystem types, storage configuration
